appearance.breed: 白色長毛貓，布偶貓風格
appearance.body: 中等身型，毛量極為蓬鬆，整隻像一團會移動的棉花糖
appearance.face: 小巧的圓臉埋在蓬鬆白毛裡，大而圓的寶石藍色眼睛，眼睛佔了臉的三分之一，自帶少女漫畫星星眼效果
appearance.fur_pattern: 全身純白色長毛，蓬鬆如雲朵。耳朵內側和鼻頭是淡粉紅色。尾巴像一支巨大的白色羽毛撢子
distinctive_features: 脖子上永遠戴著粉紅色蝴蝶結鈴鐺項圈，走路會發出清脆的叮鈴聲
眼睛是非常清澈的寶石藍，像藍寶石一樣
粉紅色的肉球（肉掌），被毛蓋住但偶爾露出來
耳朵尖端有一撮微微翹起的毛（耳尖毛）
毛太蓬鬆所以看起來比實際體型大一倍
appearance.size: 中等，但毛量讓她看起來很大一團

quirks: 被摸頭會瞬間趴下翻肚
喜歡收集亮晶晶的小東西
打噴嚏的時候會往後彈
personality.voice: 軟萌、天真、偶爾發出驚訝的小叫聲

visual_prompt_snippet: [IDENTITY CARD] Lingling — extremely fluffy pure white #FFFFFF longhair, Ragdoll-like with voluminous cloud-like fur. Small round face nearly hidden in fur, huge round sapphire-blue #0F52BA eyes (occupying ~1/3 of face) with gentle sparkle. Nose and inner ears: pale pink #FFB6C1. Neck: pink #FF69B4 ribbon bow collar with a small golden #FFD700 bell — the bell must be clearly visible and centered beneath the bow knot. Tail: enormous feathery white plume. Pink paw pads occasionally visible through fur. [HARD CONSTRAINTS] 1) Pure white fur ONLY — no colored points or patches. 2) Pink bow collar with golden bell ALWAYS visible and centered. 3) Sapphire-blue #0F52BA eyes ONLY — NEVER amber, green, or gold. 4) Longhair extremely fluffy, NEVER shorthair. 5) Pink nose and inner ears. 6) No other accessories besides the bow bell collar. End.
negative_prompt: shorthair, flat coat, sleek fur, dark patches, cream fur, grey fur, yellow fur, amber eyes, green eyes, gold eyes, missing collar, no collar, missing bell, hidden bell, red collar, blue collar, no bow, plain collar, small eyes, calico markings, siamese points, colorpoint, thin tail, tabby markings, orange patches, dirty fur, matted fur
story_context: 鈴鈴是花店老闆的愛貓，名字來自她脖子上那個永遠叮叮作響的粉紅鈴鐺。她是四隻裡最年輕的，對什麼都好奇，常常在花店裡把自己弄得滿身花瓣。走到哪裡都能聽到清脆的鈴聲，街坊都說：『聽到鈴聲就知道鈴鈴來了。』

seasonal_variants.spring: 在櫻花樹下追蝴蝶，白毛上沾滿粉色花瓣
seasonal_variants.summer: 戴著迷你草帽和太陽花，在向日葵田裡探險
seasonal_variants.autumn: 穿著小毛衣，在落葉堆裡打滾（毛上沾滿紅葉）
seasonal_variants.winter: 戴著聖誕紅蝴蝶結，在雪地裡留下蓬鬆的腳印
